description: RedisEntepriseRemoteCluster represents a remote participating cluster.

apiFqdnUrl.description: The URL of the cluster, will be used for the active-active database URL.

apiPort.description: The port number of the cluster's URL used for connectivity/sync

dbFqdnSuffix.description: The database URL suffix, will be used for the active-active database replication endpoint and replication endpoint SNI.

recName.description: The name of the REC that the RERC is pointing at

recNamespace.description: The namespace of the REC that the RERC is pointing at

secretName.description: The name of the secret containing cluster credentials. Must be of the following format: "redis-enterprise-<RERC name>"

internalObservedSecretResourceVersion.description: The observed secret resource version. Used for internal purposes only.

local.description: Indicates whether this object represents a local or a remote cluster.

observedGeneration.description: The most recent generation observed for this RERC. It corresponds to the RERC's generation, which is updated by the API Server.

specStatus.description: Whether the desired specification is valid.

status.description: The status of the remote cluster.
